headline: Schlumberger (SLB) Stock Sinks As Market Gains: What You Should Know
summary: Schlumberger (SLB) concluded the recent trading session at $33.92, signifying a -1.48% move from its prior day's close.

headline: Wall Street Bulls Look Optimistic About Schlumberger (SLB): Should You Buy?
summary: According to the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), one should invest in Schlumberger (SLB). It is debatable whether this highly sought-after metric is effective because Wall Street analysts' recommendations tend to be overly optimistic. Would it be worth investing in the stock?

headline: Stifel Reiterates Its ‘Buy’ Rating on Schlumberger Limited (SLB), Cites Company’s Strong Performance in Kimberlite’s Industry Survey
summary: With significant upside potential, Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) secures a spot on our list of the 11 Cheap Clean Energy Stocks to Buy Right Now.
